titles.title: Train Coverings for Community Safety Act
To enhance rail safety and provide for the safe and covered transport of materials in railroad cars, and for other purposes.
Train Coverings for Community Safety Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary:
Train Coverings for Community Safety Act
This bill requires the Department of Transportation to prescribe regulations requiring materials transported by rail to be completely covered while in transit, including while being held, delayed, or transferred.
